channel.title: Performance on Das Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Das Blog

item.title: Linux on my laptop, embrace the power of Kali purple and XFCE
item.description: XFCE desktop environment requires fewer system resources, making it ideal for running on older hardware or low-powered machines. It runs smoothly on systems with as little as 512MB of RAM, making it an excellent option for lightweight laptops, netbooks, and desktops.
